Articles.Content:
Hi folks, I'm an automation and robotics engineering student. I was messing about with KSP and thought  that it would be awesome if there was a way to interface the game with simulation programs like MATLAB/Simulink; the idea was to control the spaceship by a MATLAB/Simulink model in "real-time". Do you know if it can be done? 

Edited October 21, 2023 by carlo.cds
Grammatical error

Check out KOS. You can access internal variables and write control programs for just about anything you can imagine. You can control KSP over serial from external devices (home brew physical control panels etc), and there should be ways to achieve what you want but it seems redundant to me.
